task.title: How to Log In your Mail App?
task.shortdesc: Learn how to log into your Mail App.

taskbody.prereq: You have to have an account in the Mail App. If you don't have one, see the page.

context.p: Occasionally you are required to log in your account in the Mail App. To do this, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the welcome page, click the "Log in" button

result.p: If your credentials are valid, you should now see your inbox folder. If they are wrong you will be prompted to re-enter them.
If you are having issues remembering your credentials click the "Reset password" button. If you need help resetting your password, see the guide.
